snippet: Fox's alternate singing entry, "The X-Factor," was hurt by going up against "The Voice" on NBC for an hour. Meanwhile, Fox's "American Idol" is pursuing high-profile judges for its next season.
abstract: Fox's alternate singing entry, "The X-Factor," was hurt by going up against "The Voice" on NBC for an hour. Meanwhile, Fox's "American Idol" is pursuing high-profile judges for its next season.

headline.main: Fiercest Competition This Season May Be Among Singing Competitions
